attributes.additional_details:
You continue to reject my two DISTINCT petitions –
"British soldiers must be properly protected in Afghanistan when DEACTIVATING Taliban Improvised Explosive devices."
And
"British soldiers must be properly protected in Afghanistan when LOCATING Taliban Improvised Explosive devices."
On the grounds that there are already e-petitions about these issues. Please reconsider this position. Despite my best endeavours I can find no petition that covers all the content of either of these petitions.

Tim Smart
